# Task Two: Make a simple plot
```{r}
#one way
nums <- c(4,7,2,5,2,3,3,5,3,2,1,8)
plot(nums)

#another way
df <- data.frame(nums)
ggplot(data= df, aes(x= nums)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(
    title = "Random Title",
    x= "Number of Classes",
    y= "Frequency"
  ) +
  theme_bw()
```

#Using Lobstr to understand memory
```{r}
#for all
mem_used()

#for one obejct
obj_size(5)
obj_size(rep(5,5))
obj_size(df)
obj_size(matrix(3,3,3))

#memory address (where is it)
ref(5)
ref(df)
```
